data.comment: The big names in today's match at Children's Mercy Park have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 1, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
In Kansas City Kansas City drive forward through Johnny Russell. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Dallas at Children's Mercy Park.
Fafa Picault gets his shot on target but fails to score for Dallas.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 6, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dallas's half?
Alex Chilowicz signals a Kansas City throw-in in Dallas's half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Dallas in their own half.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Dallas.
Gerso Fernandes (Kansas City) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Dallas.
Goal kick for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 11, Gianluca Busio (Kansas City) has received a yellow card from Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
Dallas's Franco Jara goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Alex Chilowicz awards Dallas a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Throw-in Dallas.
Dallas's John Nelson gets in a shot on goal at Children's Mercy Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Dallas territory.
In the minute 16, Kansas City to take a throw-in in Dallas territory.
Dallas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dallas are whistled for offside.
In the minute 19, Alex Chilowicz signals a throw-in for Kansas City, close to Dallas's area.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Dallas.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
In the minute 21, Johnny Russell (Kansas City) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Dallas drive upfield and Tanner Tessmann gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kansas City defender.
Alex Chilowicz signals a Dallas throw-in in Kansas City's half.
In the minute 22, Kansas City have a goal kick.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
In the minute 24, Kansas City needs to be cautious. Dallas have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Dallas in Kansas City.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 27, In Kansas City, Matt Hedges (Dallas) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kansas City.
Dallas drives forward and Franco Jara gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
In Kansas City Kansas City attack through Gianluca Busio. The finish is off target, however.
Dallas have a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
In the minute 34, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kansas City.
Ball safe as Dallas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 36, Throw-in Kansas City.
Throw-in for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
Alex Chilowicz awards Dallas a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Franco Jara heads in to make it 0-1 at Children's Mercy Park.
John Nelson with an assist there.
In the minute 44, Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dallas's half?
Throw-in for Dallas in their own half.
Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Dallas.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Dallas at Children's Mercy Park.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second half has started at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 46, Ilie Sanchez is replacing Gerso Fernandes for the home team.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
It's now 0-2 in Kansas City as Franco Jara scores for Dallas.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Dallas at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 51, Alex Chilowicz signals a Kansas City throw-in in Dallas's half.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Dallas territory.
The home team have replaced Luis Martins with Amadou Dia. This is the second substitution made today by Peter Vermes.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
In the minute 53, Goal! Kansas City reduce the deficit to 1-2 through Johnny Russell.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Dallas.
In the minute 55, Free kick Kansas City.
Johnny Russell of Kansas City smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 56, Michael Barrios is on a sub for Harold Mosquera for Dallas.
Dallas make their second substitution with Bryan Acosta replacing Brandon Servania.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Ball safe as Dallas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 59, Can Dallas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
Kansas City have a dangerous throw-in.
Dallas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 61, In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Kansas City are coming forward and Graham Zusi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
In the minute 62, Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
Kansas City's Gianluca Busio is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 65, Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
The away team replace Fafa Picault with Ryan Hollingshead.
Throw-in Dallas.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in Dallas territory.
In the minute 67, Free kick Kansas City.
Kansas City's Johnny Russell misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
In the minute 69, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Dallas.
Can Kansas City capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 71, Gianluca Busio (Kansas City) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Kansas City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dallas's half?
Michael Barrios is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 72, Dallasâ€™s Michael Barrios is on his feet again at Children's Mercy Park.
Kansas City are pushing forward but Gianluca Busio's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 73, Goal kick for Dallas at Children's Mercy Park.
Franco Jara (Dallas) has received a first yellow card.
Dallas pushes forward through Michael Barrios, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 74, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
The away team replace Franco Jara with Bressan.
Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
At Children's Mercy Park, Michael Barrios has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 75, Dallas's Bryan Acosta has been booked in Kansas City.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Kansas City.
Alex Chilowicz awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 78, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
Johnny Russell is booked for the home team.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to Dallas.
Dallas will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kansas City.
In the minute 82, Bryan Reynolds (Dallas) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Johnny Russell (Kansas City) levels the match at 2-2 with a header.
In the minute 83, That's a fine assist from Gianluca Busio.
Throw-in for Dallas close to the penalty box.
Alex Chilowicz signals a throw-in for Dallas, close to Kansas City's area.
In the minute 86, Johnny Russell of Kansas City gets in a strike, but is off target.
Alex Chilowicz awards Dallas a goal kick.
Dallas take a 2-3 lead thanks to Ryan Hollingshead.
In the minute 87, Dallas needs to be cautious. Kansas City have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of Dallas.
Gianluca Busio for Kansas City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 88, Dallas have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Kansas City in Kansas City.
Johnny Russell (Kansas City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Kansas City's Graham Zusi attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
Alex Chilowicz will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Dallas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Dallas.
Gadi Kinda of Kansas City gets in a strike, but is off target.
Dallas have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
Free kick for Kansas City in the half of Dallas.
Full-time! The final score is 2-3.
Bryan Acosta has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
Thiago Santos (Dallas) gets a yellow card.
